string.value: I went to go see #p2140001# just as #p2140000# told me to. He immediately knew that I lost my memory and said in order to retrieve the lost memory, I would need to go back to the beginning where my adventure began...
After talking to the Memory Keeper, I went to my previous job post at Victoria Island to retrieve my memory. I wonder if I got my memory back? I guess I'll know when I try to go past Memory Lane...

The memory you lost... The memory of those innocent days when you were just a new adventurer learning the ropes. If you want to restore those memories, you have no choice but to return to that time...
Go back to the starting point when your adventures began. The place where everything was new and fascinating, where you were filled with curiosity, excitement, and anticipation...
Don't underestimate the power of a memory. You are who you are today because of the memories you have...
You are now filled with all of your memories again..
